description: A food truck featuring Utah's finest burgers! We have grass-fed beef, all natural turkey burgers and a one of kind veggie burger.Better Burger opts in for enlightened food choices. We believe you deserve to indulge in the classic American fast-food meal, but in such a way that you don't feel guilty about what you are eating. All Better burgers are local and totally unique. The beef burgers come from grass-fed cows (taste the difference). The turkey burgers come from a lovely turkey farm in Ogden, where the Wight family raises them in a happy, healthy environment. And the veggie burgers are made by Cali's Natural Foods.
name: Better Burger
